tasks.label: Desplegar y arrancar MantenimientosBackend
args: Write-Host 'Compilando proyecto...' -ForegroundColor Green; mvn clean package -q; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Iniciando TomEE...' -ForegroundColor Green; $env:TOMEE_PORT='8081'; docker-compose up --build -d; Start-Sleep 5; Write-Host 'Backend disponible en http://localhost:8081/MantenimientosBackend/' -ForegroundColor Green; docker logs tomee-server --tail 10 } else { Write-Host 'Error en compilaci√≥n' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Reiniciar Solo TomEE
args: docker restart tomee-server; Start-Sleep 5; docker logs tomee-server --tail 10
